title: WTB: T210-8 Babb (REA lot #264) and other Series 8
author: brass_rat

posts.post_title: WTB: T210-8 Babb (REA lot #264) and other Series 8
posts.post_content:
If anybody won lot 264, I'd be interested in the Babb.

(Also interested in other Series 8 cards, just not the other three in that lot.)

Thanks,
Steve
Sorry Steve, I won that lot just for the Babb.
Yup, thanks -- you were posting the pickup at the same time I was posting the want.  Thanks for following up!
